  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>mats_324</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Función lineal</string>
            <string language="en">Linear function</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lineare Funktion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fonction linéaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Função linear</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Funzione lineare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραμμική λειτουργία</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">unidad didáctica que desarrolla mediante simulaciones el concepto de función polinómica de primer grado. Se estudia su gráfica, sus propiedades y se proponen actividades relacionadas.</string>
            <string language="en">teaching unit which uses simulations to introduce the concept of first degree polynomial function. It studies its graph, properties and suggests some related activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">primer grado</string>
            <string language="en">first degree</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">recta</string>
            <string language="en">line</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">gráfica</string>
            <string language="en">graph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">lineal</string>
            <string language="en">linear</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">función</string>
            <string language="en">function</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">unterrichtende Maßeinheit welcher Gebrauch 
Simulationen, das Konzept der ersten Gradpolynomfunktion vorzustellen.
Sie studiert sein Diagramm, Eigenschaften und schlägt etwas in 
Verbindung stehende Aktivitäten vor.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">unité d'enseignement quelles utilisations 
simulations de présenter le concept de la première fonction de 
polynôme de degré. Elle étudie son graphique, propriétés et
suggère quelques activités relatives.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">unidade ensinando que usos simulações 
introduzir o conceito da primeira função do polynomial do grau. 
Estuda seu gráfico, propriedades e sugere algumas atividades 
relacionadas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">unità d'istruzione quali usi simulazioni 
introdurre il concetto della prima funzione di polinomio di grado. 
Studia il relativo grafico, proprietà e suggerisce alcune 
attività relative.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μονάδα διδασκαλίας που χρησιμοποιεί τις προσομοιώσεις 
για να εισαγάγει την έννοια της πολυωνυμικής λειτουργίας πρώτου 
βαθμού. Μελετά τη γραφική παράστασή του, ιδιότητες και 
προτείνει μερικές σχετικές δραστηριότητες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erster Grad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
